articles.title: Rangers facing difficult transfer window but can get back on title track before Celtic clash - Barry Ferguson - Daily Record
articles.description: Barry believes recruiting properly in January will be difficult but maximum points after the break can reel Hoops in.
articles.content:
There's no better time for everyone at Rangers to take a breath. 
 A break for the World Cup for Gio van Bronckhorst, the players, board and the fans to have a period of calm. I've spoken previously… [+5121 chars]
